en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, World Renowned Shoe Designer, Prof Dato Jimmy Choo Together with His Cousin Peter Chow and FE Leaders, Andy Lee and Teddy Chen.
en.content:
FE Welcomes QP Wearer, World Renowned Shoe Designer, Prof Dato Jimmy Choo Together with His Cousin Peter Chow and FE Leaders, Andy Lee and Teddy Chen.
 
Photo was taken recently in London when Andy was there to promote FE's Quantum Pendant.

meta.description: Photo was taken recently in London when Andy was there to promote FE's Quantum Pendant.
